biotools.summary: A tool for linking patient information based on The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) with OMIM disease catalog. The tool performs semantic similarity analysis, visualizes the results in an interactive user interface and enables users to manually correct the results if needed.

bioschemas.name: OMIM explorer
bioschemas.summary: A tool for linking patient information based on The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) with OMIM disease catalog. The tool performs semantic similarity analysis, visualizes the results in an interactive user interface and enables users to manually correct the results if needed.
